PHRASE.LANG: kName
Leotard with Tights to be Worn with Shoes (Red, Women)
Body et collants à porter avec des chaussures (Rouge, Femme)
Gymnastikanzug und Stockings, mit Schuhen tragbar (rot, für Frauen)
Body e collant da abbinare alle scarpe (rosso, da donna)

タイツ付きレオタード・靴重ね履き用（赤・女性）

Leotard with Tights to be Worn with Shoes (Red, Women)

緊身衣和緊身褲/可配穿鞋子（紅色/女用）
Leotard and Tights for Wearing with Shoes (Red, Female)
kDesc
A red leotard with brown tights. Can be worn with shoes. [#Legal]
Body rouge et collants marrons. Peut être porté avec des chaussures. [#Legal]
Roter Gymnastikanzug und braune Stockings. Schuhe können darüber angezogen werden.[#Legal]
Body rosso e collant marroni. Abbinabili con delle scarpe.[#Legal]
Leotardo rojo y medias marrones. Los zapatos se pueden poner por encima. [#Legal]
赤いレオタードとブラウンのタイツ。上から靴を履ける。[#Legal]
빨간색 레오타드와 갈색 타이츠. 위에 신발을 신을 수 있다. [#Legal]
A red leotard with brown tights. Can be worn with shoes. [#Legal]
紅色緊身衣和啡色緊身褲。可加穿鞋子。[#Legal]
紅色緊身衣和褐色緊身褲。可加穿鞋子。[#Legal]
A red leotard and brown tights. Shoes can be worn on top. [#Legal]
